resources.string: Create your patch using desired receivers, upload to your SD card and load using Browse menu option.\n\nFor information on the sensors, have a look at the Help menu option.

You can use any of the receivers from available sensors to interact with your patch.

If Accelerometer is available, you can use these receivers:
 [r sensor_1_0], [r sensor_1_1], [r sensor_1_2]

Touch screen sensors are also available:
 [r touch_x] and [r touch_y].

You can also use WiFi signal information:
 [r wifi_WiFiSSID_level] and [r wifi_WiFiSSID_frequency]

Check available sensors below.
Thanks for using Sensors2Pd.

The zip file needs a Pd file with the same name inside: patch.zip -> patch.pd
